title: tae reduction by 20 percent every 1 years and when it reaches 8% we start tae as the first day
body: according to coinmarket cap there is a max supply of 888.888.888 million, i propose this since by reducing the TAE over the years we will not burst this currency as they have done with others and looking to the future less and less coins and recovering to 80% to return follow the cycle
author: 0xfa0d87b081d2b045fe301649EaBa60bE4fDC5310
